title: The Untold History of Novelty Keychains

image.description: A giant, oversized keychain shaped like a banana, hanging from the Eiffel Tower
A collage of various novelty keychains from different eras, arranged to form the shape of a question mark
A group of ancient Egyptians gathered around a hieroglyphic depiction of a keychain, looking puzzled
A pie chart made entirely of miniature keychain pizzas, with text overlay: 'Market Share by Flavor'
A keychain-themed amusement park, with roller coasters shaped like keys and a Ferris wheel made of dangling keychains
An astronaut on the moon, planting a flag with a novelty keychain attached to it
A dramatic courtroom scene where the judge is using a gavel-shaped keychain instead of an actual gavel
A secret underground vault filled with rare and valuable keychains, guarded by laser beams and security robots
A random image of a rubber duck wearing sunglasses, with the text 'In Conclusion' overlaid in a bold font
